reviewText: Horrible movie that perpetuates the idea that all Mexicans can do is manual labor e,g, gardener, day laborer, or someone selling oranges on the corner. I understand it was supposed to be funny but the movie wasn't. Obviously not written, produced or directed by anyone with a Latino perspective.
Funny, silly, thought-inspiring, with good family values ... and, of course, a mockumentary!!!!!
Funny & heartwarming mockumentary with great musical interludes.
